channel.title: 生活 on Cactusnix

item.title: 2019年度总结
item.description: 引言 本文起草于在公司的加班的时候，完成于… 不知不觉，2019年就要结束了，今年发生的事情有很多，有些记录了，有些遗漏了，在2019年快要结束的时候，我想给自己的生活做些总结。准备从生活、

item.title: 7 years
item.description: Description: A meaningful song. 7 years Once I was seven years old my momma told me Go make yourself some friends or you'll be lonelyOnce I was seven years old It was a big big world, but we thought we were bigger Pushing each other to the limits, we were learning quicker By eleven smoking herb and drinking burning liquor Never rich so we were out to make that steady figure Once I was eleven years old my daddy told me Go get yourself a wife or you'll be lonely Once I was eleven years old I always had that

item.title: Pity
item.description: Description: The pity. 看着照片，猜测着地点，在体育馆遇见 遗憾没能说出： 好巧，你也散步，要不一起走走 一圈两圈，一个人两个人 离开时，下起了雨 雨越下越大，脚步越走越快 应景得有些难过 而这一切，她都不曾得知 而时间也教会了我，什

item.title: learn vicious circle
item.description: Description: I'm lost in the learn vicious circle. Recently, I fall into the learn vicious circle. When I learn programming, meeting the problems is very normal. However, there is a problem that when I solve out one problem, another problem appears in front of me. Therefore, I have to solve the new problem. So back and forth. The effectiveness is so low. I spend a lot of time, but got less. This is the learn vicious circle. It suckes me! My english is so poor. It's hard to continue my article. Should I be trapped there. Just now, I heared
